## Corporation.getUpgradeLevel() method

Get the level of a levelable upgrade.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getUpgradeLevel(upgradeName: CorpUpgradeName): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  upgradeName | [CorpUpgradeName](./bitburner.corpupgradename.md) | Name of the upgrade |

**Returns:**

number

The level of the upgrade
